system.description:
You are not part of the fellowship. You are chasing them.

Every session, you are either hot on their trail, or lying in wait ahead of them. When there is a lull in the action, you may jump in to mess things up. Tell us where you're coming from, and take the Spotlight.

If you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.cnXubqxIogR16JMj]{Finish Them} or the fellowship @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.cnXubqxIogR16JMj]{Finishes You} with Blood, on a 10+, the player who was Finished damages all their stats and becomes Taken Out. This happens instead of being killed. When rolling with other stats, apply the usual 10+ @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.cnXubqxIogR16JMj]{Finish Them} results.

When you get Taken Out, you are out of play for the rest of the session, but you will @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.YNOTCTxDOQMVmtTO]{Recover} between session.

You do not @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.YNOTCTxDOQMVmtTO]{Recover} when the rest of the fellowship does.

When you join the fellowship, temporarily or otherwise, replace this playbook with @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-pb-redeemed.Item.TNDLolyJ2iRgnPVY]{The Redeemed}. Keep all the same options you picked, including your level and Moves and stats, but use the text found on that playbook instead.

This Move cannot be Shared.
